meanings.definition: A type of grass used for hay.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the timothy to feed his animals.
meanings.sent2: The timothy in the field was ready to be cut and baled.
meanings.sent3: The cows happily munched on the timothy, wagging their tails.
meanings.sent4: The timothy swayed gently in the breeze, a sea of green waves.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of fresh timothy filled the barn, comforting the horses.

meanings.sent1: Timothy is excited to celebrate his birthday with friends.
meanings.sent2: I met a man named Timothy at the party last night.
meanings.sent3: Timothy told a funny joke that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: With a smile as bright as the sun, Timothy greeted his guests warmly.
meanings.sent5: The name Timothy always reminds me of kindness and laughter.
